md:
giải nghĩa từ "centerpiece" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Centerpiece (noun) - Điểm nhấn trung tâm

* Meaning: The most important or attractive part of something, such as a decoration or a piece of furniture, that is placed in the middle of a room or a table.

Example sentence: The beautiful vase was the centerpiece of the dining table.

* Related words: decoration, furniture, table, room, attractive.

Note: The word "centerpiece" can also refer to a person or thing that is the main focus of attention or interest.
